(507x1+0)/1 mod 1024 = 507. (507x3+1)/2 mod 512 = 249. (507x9+5)/4 mod 256 = 118. (507x9+5)/8 mod 128 = 59. (507x27+23)/16 mod 64 = 25. (507x81+85)/32 mod 32 = 6. (507x81+85)/64 mod 16 = 3. (507x243+319)/128 mod 8 = 5. (507x729+1085)/256 mod 4 = 0. (507x729+1085)/512 mod 2 = 0. (507x729+1085)/1024 mod 1 = 0.
